highlighter.heading: Click and drag on the page to help us better understand your feedback. You can move this dialog if it's in the way.
highlighter.highlight-title: Highlight areas relevant to your feedback

description.heading: Feedback lets you send us suggestions about our products. We welcome problem reports, feature ideas and general comments.
description.desc: Start by writing a brief description:
description.highlight: Next we'll let you identify areas of the page related to your description.

submit-error.heading: Sadly an error occurred while sending your feedback. Please try again.

submit-success.heading: Thank you for your feedback. We value every piece of feedback we receive.
submit-success.sub: We cannot respond individually to every one, but we will use your comments as we strive to improve your experience.
